translations.modules.flow.circuit_breaker.description: Circuit breaker pattern to prevent cascading failures
translations.modules.flow.circuit_breaker.label: Circuit Breaker

translations.modules.flow.debounce.params.delay_ms.de: Wait time after last call before executing

translations.modules.flow.debounce.params.trailing.de: Execute on the trailing edge (after delay expires)

translations.modules.flow.rate_limit.params.max_reque: Maximum number of requests allowed per window

translations.modules.flow.retry.label: Retry

translations.modules.flow.retry.params.max_delay_ms.d: Maximum delay between retries in milliseconds
translations.modules.flow.retry.params.retry_on_error: Error types to retry on (empty means retry all)

translations.modules.flow.throttle.params.interval_ms: Minimum time between executions in milliseconds
